author: djames
msg: In the ctypes-python-bindings branch: Update the WC tests to pass on Windows.
* test/wc.py
(repo_url): Don't add extra slashes on Windows.
(test_diff, test_propget, test_update, test_switch): Update to pass on
Windows.

author: djames
msg: On the ctypes-python-bindings branch.
* test/remoterepos.py: Update pre-revprop-change hook to work on Windows
as well.

author: djames
msg: On the ctypes-python-bindings branch: Remove libraries that shouldn't
be wrapped from list of libraries to wrap.
* autogen.py: As above.

author: djames
msg: On the ctypes-python-bindings branch: Tweak our error handling code to
work on Windows.
* csvn/core/functions.py.in
(SubversionException.__init__): Use NamedTemporaryFile instead of
TemporaryFile so that there are no platform-specific differences.

author: lgo
msg: ra_serf: fix lock test 18: Depending on which error is returned, ra_serf might
store it in lock_ctx->error or make it the return value of serf_context_run or
even both. Handle them in the correct order so we return the correct error and
exit code to the user.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/locks.c
(svn_ra_serf__lock): Handle both lock_ctx->error and err, in the correct
order.
